item.title: The World Is Going Exactly Where It's Supposed To Go!
item.description: It was the summer of 2008 when I saw a movie that would change the trajectory of my life to the path it took to bring me to who I am today. I was completely unaware of the problematic life of the main actor, obviously unaware and unprepared for the next decade or so of the movie universe that that movie will start. I mean, I wasn’t even 11 yet, how could I be?
